aboutMeText:
Hello! My name is Davide Religioso and I'm from Stuttgart in Germany. I have always been enthusiastic about the Internet, digitalization and technical innovations. Now it's time to bring this enthusiasm to my job as a frontend developer.

Just over a year ago, I decided to further my education in the field of frontend development. The Developer Academy was a great support and helped me to achieve my goals. Without their help, it would have been much more difficult.

Before I came to frontend development, I worked as a CNC milling machine operator. There I learned to work precisely and pay attention to detail. I now want to use these skills in programming to develop myself further.
